CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: To investigate the photovoltaic properties of the NDT - based semiconductor , PSC devices with a configuration of ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polymer : PC71BM / Ca / Al were fabricated.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| ------------ |
| NDT-based semiconductor |
| ITO |
| PEDOT : PSS |
| polymer : PC71BM |
| Ca |
| Al |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| ------------ |
| NDT-based semiconductor |
| ITO |
| PEDOT : PSS |
| polymer : PC71BM |
| Ca |
| Al |

Explanation:
ITO, PEDOT : PSS, polymer : PC71BM, Ca, and Al are all material names mentioned in the paragraph. NDT is an abbreviation for Non-Destructive Testing, which is a process rather than a material.
